The HTTP toolkit for Kotlin applications

http4k provides a simple and uniform way to serve and consume HTTP services.

Quick Start

Easy for developers

Highlights

Small
footprint

The core library has no other dependencies and it’s enough to get started.

Highly
extendable

Template engines, rendering formats, operability and resilience features, testing tools…

http4k provides 30+ integrations for developers to choose from

First class
testability

Testing can be done in-memory without actual running servers or network communication.

Various approaches such as Approval and Chaos Testing are also supported.

Supportive
community

The core library has no other dependencies and it’s enough to get started.

our community
